paramInformation.label: Pulse factor
paramInformation.description: Impulse or Rotation factor (see NorthQ docs for Gas meters)

paramInformation.label: Pulse count
paramInformation.description: This register holds the total number of pulses.

paramInformation.label: Keep alive period
paramInformation.description: How many ticks before going back to sleep in normal wakeup mode.

paramInformation.label: Real-time mode
paramInformation.description: Set this to enter real-time mode from remote.

paramInformation.label: Calibration status
paramInformation.description: Aplies to devices with firmware version 3.30 or higher
